transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, ki bolchen?
Customer: Bluebird machinery se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Sir very good afternoon mein Aasim Khan bol raha tha sir IndiaMART se business manager aapki company registered hai na sir IndiaMART ke sath mein sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan bilkul bilkul bilkul sir.
Executive: To iski service ke regarding sir mein baat karna chah raha tha mein dekh raha tha aap kafi lambe time se IndiaMART ke sath jude hue hain lekin is baar sir aapne apni service ka renewal nahi karwaya sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi actually nahi kar paya actually mein aapko bata raha hu mera bahut hi heavy tabiyat kharab tha do mahina se to actually aapko pata hai Shivani ji ne mere ko bahut contact kiya hai lekin maine unko communicate nahi kar paya iske liye bahut hi sorry dil se unko bhi bol dijiyega kyunki mera chakkar mein account pura band ho gaya ho chuka hai kyunki ye department pura mein dekhta hu to iske liye sorry bahut jaldi open karwane wale hu thik hai na kam se kam 24 25 tarikh ko hum duty join kar rahe hain.
Executive: Sir aap isko mein maafi chahunga beech sir aapko rok raha hu mein sir isko ye bol raha hu aapka itna purana promotion hai isko aap aaj ya kal isko posting karwa dijiye kyunki sir ye delete ho gaya to phir dobara aap karwa bhi nahi paoge abhi sirf aapki jo buylead ka section hai wo sirf disable hua hai kyunki jo company hamari ke jitne bhi purane client hai unko ekdam yani ki delete nahi karti hai account abhi jaise jo aapka buylead ka section hai wo buylead milna sir aapko band hui hai baki sir aapka catalog wagera sab kuch hai lekin sir ye kabhi bhi close ho sakta hai wo ho sakta hai aaj bhi ho jaye kal bhi ho jaye ya parso bhi ho jaye sir.
Customer: Haan samajh gaya.
Executive: Agar abhi aap buylead ko click kar rahe honge to buylead consume nahi ho pa rahi hogi sir.
Customer: Achha aapne kya naam bataya sir aapka?
Executive: Sir mera Aasim Khan hai mein Shivani ka business manager hu wo meri team mein kaam karti hai Shivani ji jo hai.
Customer: Thik hai hum samajh gaye dekhiye actually sir mein aapko batana chahta hu senior hone ke naate jo
Executive: Haan ji haan ji bilkul sir.
Customer: Actually senior hone ke naate sir meri ye duty rehti hai ke jo bhi purane jo bhi purane client hai unse ek baar baat karke dekho reason jaano ke kya koi IndiaMART ki side se koi problem rahi hai agar uske upar hum kaam kar sakte hain to wo bhi kiya ja sakta hai isliye sir senior hone ke naate jo bhi purane client hai unko call karne kar mere ko plus maine dekha aapka itna purana promotion hai aapki baat bhi chal rahi thi aur phir suddenly yani ki wo ho nahi paya close ho gayi to isliye bas maine sir aapko ek hi hello call kiya tha baki koi aisa mera maksad nahi tha ke aapko disturb karne ka.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul aara hai aap log disturb kijiye isme koi badi baat nahi hai kyunki aap log disturb karoge to phir hum log ka kamai hoga na.
Customer: Haan bilkul iske liye mein maafi chahta hu aapko thoda sa thoda chota sa mein bolna chah raha hu na actually kya dekhiye hum to do mahine se bahut tabiyat kharab tha mera to mein duty join nahi kar paya to us us karan ke liye hamare office se bahut kaam idhar udhar ho gaya to isliye hum log ka board hum log ka jo partnership wala farm hai to isme hum log ka ek board meeting rakha hua hai 23 November ko.
Executive: To 23 November ko hum log meeting agar complete kar lete hain na to uske baad ho sake 24 ya 25 tarikh ko mein khud Shivani ji ko call karne wali thi agar dekhiye kismat hai hum log ka to aapka IndiaMART humse kaam ho ya na ho fact usme nahi aata hai lekin IndiaMART se ek achha hum log ka bahut din se rista ho chuka hai aur aagami din bada plan lene se achha hum log ka result bhi milne wala hai ye hum log bhi jaan rahe hain lekin thoda sa kya kare abhi beech mein medical wala problem aa gaya to iske liye mein sabse maafi mangta phir raha hu mein apna company se bhi maafi mang raha hu aap logo se bhi mein sorry mang raha hu.
Executive: Sir aap waha par jaise aap waha par working hai sir ya iske director hai company mein sir aap?
Customer: Actually mein director hu lekin ye sales ka department mein khud sambhalta hu thik hai na.
Executive: Agar sales ka department aap dekhte hain baki ke yani ki to wo to sir actually decision maker to phir aap hi hai sir yani ki isme.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul bilkul bilkul maine dekha tha sir aapka profile wagera na sir maine aapka sara profile wagera dekha to kafi achha profile hai kafi bada yani ki shukr bhagwan ka aapka jo machinery wagera mein aap deal kar sakte hain jo website hai na bluebird machinery.com ke naam se jo aapki website hai wo maine abhi pura sara wo check kar raha dekh raha tha aapka to achha hai sir badhiya hai machinery wagera jo aap banate ho yani ki thoda ek premium machinery hai koi aisa nahi hai do char hazar 10 hazar ek lakh do ki hai premium machinery hai to us hisab se sir haan is industry mein agar mein baat karu to mostly client sir IndiaMART par India mein jitne bhi hai na uske 80% log jude hue hi hai IndiaMART ke sath.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Kyunki sir thoda premium product hai aapka to online lead unko milti rehti hai.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul dekhiye aap mota moti Shivani ji ko bol dijiyega to actually mein unko 24 tarikh ko ya ho sake 25 tarikh ko unko hum call karne wale hain thik hai na bas ek do char din thoda sa unko thoda wait karne bol dijiyega please thik hai na.
Executive: Thik hai mein ek baar sir unko inform kar dunga thoda priority pe lekar sir aap isko karwa lijiye finalize baki kuch rehta hai wo aap mere ko bata dijiye pehle renewal ko karwate hain phir uske baad jo aap logo ka package se baat hua tha.
Customer: Haan pehle wahi mein bol raha hu pehle isko karte hain phir baad mein sir jaise aapka pehle sir apna promotion yani ki save karna jaruri hai uske aage jo bhi aapka plan banta hai jaise aapko lagta hai wo to phir baad mein bhi aap karwate rahoge koi dikkat wali baat hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm thik hai dekhte hain.
Customer: Aap kuch offer wagera chal raha hai kya is time kuch offer wagera chal raha hai kya aap logo ka?
Executive: Sir offer to sir yahi hai ke sir agar mein baat karta hu sir agar services ka renewal wagera karo jo bhi aap purane client hai sir to jo bhi best price hoga wo aapko isme karwa kar diya jayega agar aap same service ka renewal karwate ho jo service aap chala rahe ho to uski jo agar mein aapka jo mil raha tha aapka mini dynamic catalog service chal raha hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: MDC mini dynamic catalog MDC service jisse bolte hain to usme sir aapka yani ki jo hota hai haan usme yani ki aapka jo ek saal ki costing ki agar mein baat karta hu agar aap check bhi kar sakte ho.
Executive: 32000 plus GST hai but aapka sir wo 38000 plus GST mein one year ka renewal ho jayega sir waha se.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai dekhte hain aapka wo 24 tarikh ko hum call karne dijiye mere ko thik hai na phir Shivani ji mere ko kya offer dete hain aap log kya dete hain usi din chaliye aap baat ho jayega thik hai na.
Executive: Aap bilkul befikar rahiye sir jo bhi best hai wo aapko karwa kar diya jayega sir aap jaise sir aapko lag raha hai IndiaMART ka best hai sir hamare bhi rehta hai aapki yani ki value ke hamare jitne bhi purane client hai wo hamara platform chhod kar na jaye lambe time se jude rahe sir to jo bhi hamare liye best hoga wo karwaya jayega definitely sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir koi issue nahi hai 24 se 25 tarikh ko dobara baat kar lenge.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul thank you thank you sir thank you thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account is temporarily disabled.

- Wants to renew the subscription.

- Enquired about any offers on renewal.



Resolution:

- Executive assured best price for renewal.

- Executive will inform Shivani about the call.

- Executive explained the benefits of renewing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call on 24th or 25th November.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, buyleads, promotion
